abstract: HSBC  on Thursday denied a South Korean media report that said it had agreed with U.S. private equity firm Lone Star to set a new deadline for a $6.3 billion deal for control of Korea Exchange Bank.
lead_paragraph: HSBC  on Thursday denied a South Korean media report that said it had agreed with U.S. private equity firm Lone Star to set a new deadline for a $6.3 billion deal for control of Korea Exchange Bank.

headline.main: HSBC Denies Extension on Korean Deal With Lone Star
